price: A lõkacin da suka ce: "Yã Allah! Idan wannan ya kasancc shĩ ne gaskiya daga wurinKa, sai Ka yi ruwan duwãtsu, a kanmu, daga sama, kõ kuwa Kazõ mana da wata azãba, mai raɗaɗi."
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالُواْ ٱللَّهُمَّ إِن كَانَ هَٰذَا هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِنۡ عِندِكَ فَأَمۡطِرۡ عَلَيۡنَا حِجَارَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَوِ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
